post:
![](https://cubedata.net/img/cd-logo.svg)

CubeData is proud to announce we own all of our hardware including our network switches our servers! So rest assured we aren't going anywhere

Our VPS Plans are absolutely un-managed! We do not offer more than un-managed support and at these prices we really cannot.

We have DDoS protection included on our physical servers so your vps's won't be overwhelmed with DDoS issues!

Plan #1

512MB RAM

2 CPU Cores

25GB HDD

512GB Bandwidth

1Gbps Connectivity

$3/month 

Dallas,TX USA

[Order](https://cubedata.net/order/config/index/vps/?group_id=4&pricing_id=40)


Plan #2

1024MB RAM

2 CPU Cores

40GB HDD

1TB Bandwidth

1Gbps Connectivity

$5/month

Dallas,TX USA

[Order](https://cubedata.net/order/config/index/vps/?group_id=4&pricing_id=41)

Plan #3
1536MB RAM

2 CPU Cores

55GB HDD

1.5TB Bandwidth

1Gbps Connectivity

$7/month 

Dallas,TX USA

[Order](https://cubedata.net/order/config/index/vps/?group_id=4&pricing_id=42)

Payments can be made via PayPal. All orders are provisioned instantly after payment, assuming you pass our fraud screening system. Due to this offer being high risk for fraud/abuse; if you aren't allowed by our automated fraud screening system then sorry we cannot do anything about that sorry.

Additional IPv4 addresses are $2 each with valid justification. Please open a ticket to order additional IP addresses

Please read our [terms of service](https://cubedata.net/terms) and our [Acceptable User Policy](https://cubedata.net/aup) before signing up to avoid any possible disappointment down the road.

Please let us know if you have any questions; we'd be happy to answer them.
